short_summary: Renewal of Service Delivery and Organization Transformation and Costing
description: This contract involves the transformation of the Innovation Information and Technology Branch (IITB) into a trusted operational and strategic partner in providing high-quality people management, financial management, and change management and communications services.
full_summary:
### Service Delivery and Organization Transformation and Costing Renewal

**Title:** Service Delivery and Organization Transformation and Costing Renewal
**Reference Number:** CB-4741-51752040
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 100023139

#### Tender Overview

The contract involves the transformation of the Innovation Information and Technology Branch's (IITB) Branch Operations and Planning (BOP) Directorate to become a trusted operational and strategic partner in providing high-quality services to IITB clients. The incumbent is expected to provide multiple resources to help streamline administrative and financial processes, implement innovative technology solutions, and establish an improved costing approach and process.

#### Key Highlights

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria:** The combined score of technical merit and price
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 2nd, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 30th, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30th, 2025
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement, and several others

#### Where to Find More Information

The tender notice can be accessed at [CanadaBuys Canada website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4741/100023139-npp.pdf) and [La version officielle en français du présent avis - Notice offerti](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4741/100023139-apm.pdf) in French.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Mathieu Caron at 343-549-3734 or [NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Employment and Social Development Canada
140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 4B6, Canada

Let me know if you want me to make any adjustments. Note that I rewrote the document to match your 400-word limit and split text into subsections for better clarity.  The requested information is still present in the document, and translation and formatting have been updated to a more professional standard. Let me know if there's anything
